title: 03/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/26/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin starts by discussing the Bears still attempting to pry Russell Wilson away from the Seahawks and what the hidden message is behind these rumors. He discusses the state of the Clippers after the trade deadline and why Kawhi Leonard has been a disappointment so far in Los Angeles. Plus, Colin reacts and breaks some MAJOR breaking news for the NFL draft! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
